ConditionCodeSearchParameter

Parameter code:token

Searches for condition based on the condition concept code eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?code={code}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ConditionCodeSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on the condition concept code eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?code={code}
